auth:login.description: Login to Contentstack and save the session for further use

username.name: username
username.description: Email address of your Contentstack account

auth:logout.description: Log out from Contentstack and clear the session

auth:tokens:add.description:
Adds management/delivery tokens to your session to use it with further CLI command
by default it adds management token if either of management or delivery flags are not set

delivery.name: delivery
delivery.description: Set this while saving delivery token

management.name: management
management.description: Set this while saving management token

api-key.name: api-key
api-key.description: Stack API key for the token

force.name: force
force.description: Exclude confirmation to replace existing alias

token.name: token
token.description: Sets token. Can be set via environment variable 'TOKEN'. We recommend to use env variable

auth:tokens.description: Lists all existing tokens added to the session

sort.name: sort
sort.description: property to sort by (prepend '-' for descending)

filter.name: filter
filter.description: filter property by partial string matching, ex: name=foo

output.name: output
output.description: output in a more machine friendly format

no-truncate.name: no-truncate
no-truncate.description: do not truncate output to fit screen

alias.name: alias
alias.description: Alias (name) of the token to remove

ignore.name: ignore
ignore.description: Ignores if token not present. Command shows show list of available aliases with multi select option to delete tokens from that list.
